description: Removal of 1no. existing monopole, relocation of existing VF equipment and replacement with 1no. 15m monopole to accommodate 3no. new TEF antennas, 1no. GPS module, 6no. RRUs and 2no. new equipment cabinets and associated ancillary works thereto
decision_conditions: Prior to any above ground works a sample of the facing materials to be utilised in the development hereby permitted (the mast and assocaited equipment) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall then be built/finished in accordance with these approved samples.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012. These details are required prior to commencement of development because the details would affect subsequent design of other elements of the scheme and must be agreed at the outset.
Condition 32 - Officers have reviewed the information provided and are satisfied this can now be discharged.
Please amend the submitted sketch plan to clearly show the location of the tree.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable repeat works without adverse impact on public amenity or tree health.Recommendation:No objections.
